item.description:
Hello photographers! 

The meeting Begins at [b]7:30[/b] PM the Last Thursday of every month. So from 7:30 to 8:00 will be open and social! Hanging out chit chatting will be encouraged! The from 8:00 to 9:00 we will have a more organized agenda. A topic, a presentation, a group sharing of images, something related to Photography! Then from 9 to 9:30 We will hang out again catching up with folks from that evenings topic. We'll clean up and head out by 9:45. 

Going forward we will be asking for a donation at the meetups of $5.00 to cover costs. However it's not manditory to attend - just please donate if you can... [:D] Cheers, Donna
item.how_to_find_us: Scott and I are always to try to greet everyone who comes to the meetups. We'll

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP
